parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To ask, request, petition, demand. Of uncertain derivation; to ask.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To turn away, pervert, remove; I restore, replace; mid: I desert, reject. From apo and strepho; to turn away or back.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
To lend; mid: I borrow. From daneion; to loan on interest; reflexively, to borrow.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
